Details: EXPERTISE: Piloting A deft handler able to Sprint further, become harder to hit, and even move after shooting thanks to Ace Pilot. Skilled in handling a 'Mech and avoiding damage through the use of Sure Footing, and better at hitting with Melee attacks. Has an increased threshold at which piloted 'Mechs become UNSTEADY. SPECIALIZATION: Gunnery Adept at the use of ranged weaponry in combat and able to tackle multiple opponents at once via Multi-Target.
